name: Extract DevAddr
define type of device
Sensor data hex/string decode
info:
This node decode the payload
from HEX to String

name: HEX to base64
info:
This node will convert the message
on base64 format

Input: HEX message
Output: Base64 message

name: Extract Information
info:
From the string in Input,
this node will convert it on a dict
with this format: 
{unit_measure : value}

name: Get Values
func:
let msg1 = {};
let msg2 = {};
let msg3 = {};
let msg4 = {};
let msg5 = {};
let msg6 = {};

var values = msg.payload.out

node.warn(values)

var temp = msg.payload.out.T
var hum = msg.payload.out.H
var soil = msg.payload.out.S
var pressure = msg.payload.out.P
var uv = msg.payload.out.U

msg1.topic = "Temperature"
msg1.payload = temp

msg2.topic = "Humidity"
msg2.payload = hum

msg3.topic = "Humidity Soil"
msg3.payload = soil

msg4.topic = "Pressure"
msg4.payload = pressure

msg5.topic = "UV"
msg5.payload = uv

node.send([msg1, msg2, msg3, msg4, msg5, null])

name: Temp
func:
msg.topic = "Temperature from L1 board"

return msg;

name: Hum
func:
msg.topic = "Humidity from L1 board"

return msg;

name: Humidity Soil
func:
msg.topic = "Humidity Soil from L1 board"

return msg;

name: Pressure
func:
msg.topic = "Pressure from L1 board"

return msg;

name: UV
func:
msg.topic = "UV from L1 board"

return msg;

name: NEED TO CHANGE
func:
msg.topic = "NEED TO CHANGE"

return msg;
